About Me

Hey! My name is Tomasz. Let me tell you a little bit about myself...

  • I'm a self-taught full stack web developer

  • I'm a critical thinker and problem solving individual happy to deliver the latest in both front and back end technology

  • Besides programming, I enjoy hiking and playing board games

What I Specialize In

Full stack web development for websites and mobile applications

Code

As I continue growing as a developer, I intend to develop clean, readable, easily mantainable and well-commented code. This facilitates cooperation with other developers and saves my future self from headaches.

Visual Design

First impression is what matters in front end web development. My goal is to find balance between the great functionality that a user can experience and beautiful interface.

Self-development

In this business there is a constant need to learn and update your knowledge and technical skills. I'm happy to continue studying the latest web development technologies!

Let's create something together!
